OfferID.description: A product or products available at the given price and terms.

objID.description: A unique identifier within this document for this object.

OfferRef.description: Refers to the objID on an object defined elsewhere in the current document.

Offer.description: A product or products available at the given price and terms.

taxExcludedInd.description: By default, taxes are included.  When present and true, all taxes are excluded from the price.  Individual taxes may be excluded using the indicator on the tax object.

OfferConfirmed.description: A product or products available at the given price and terms.

OfferQueryOffer.description: A product or products available at the given price and terms.

objID.description: A unique identifier within this document for this object.

OrderRef.description: Refers to the objID on an object defined elsewhere in the current document.

TermsAndConditionsID.description: The terms and conditions related to an offer.

objID.description: A unique identifier within this document for this object.

TermsAndConditionsRef.description: Refers to the objID on an object defined elsewhere in the current document.

TermsAndConditions.description: The terms and conditions related to an offer.

duration.description: Specifies the duration of the trip.

PaymentID.description: Payment information which may be related to one or more offers.

objID.description: A unique identifier within this document for this object.

PaymentRef.description: Refers to the objID on an object defined elsewhere in the current document.

Payment.description: Payment information which may be related to one or more offers.

OfferRef.description: The offer that the payment is for.

estimateInd.description: When true, indicates the total price is an estimate.

taxExcludedInd.description: Taxes are included in the Total price unless this indicator is set.  Individual taxes may be excluded by indicating as such on the individual tax item.

retribution.description: An enumerated type defining the type of action taken when the deadline has been exceeded. Valid values: Res Automatically Cancelled, Res No Longer Guaranteed.

type.description: An enumerated type defining the guarantee to be applied to this reservation.

guaranteePolicyType.description: GuaranteePolicyType: An enumerated type that defines the guarantee policy applied to the booking restrictions.

Policy.description: Policy information regarding the ancillary for example Power Cart rental policy.

FeeType_Enum.description: A descriptor for the fee amount, such as low, high and average.

RateCategory_Enum.description: The RateCategory attribute defines a set of valid values for the category of a rate. Typically rates are offered as either Leisure rates or Business (Corporate) rates, with a business rate usually including additional costs such as the cost of insurance, etc.  This set of values defines the rate categories. Refer to OpenTravel Code List Rate Category (RTC).

noCardHolderInfoReqInd.description: If true, no credit card holder information is required. If false, it is not required.

nameReqInd.description: If true, the credit card holder name is required. If false, it is not required.

addressReqInd.description: If true, credit card holder address is required. If false, it is not required.

phoneReqInd.description: If true, credit card holder phone number is required. If false, it is not required.

interbankNbrReqInd.description: If true, the credit card interbank number is required. If false, it is not required.

bookingSourceAllowedInd.description: When true, the booking source may be used to guarantee the booking.

corpDiscountNbrAllowedInd.description: When true, the corporate discount number may be used to guarantee the booking.

GuaranteeType_Enum.description: An enumerated type defining the guarantee to be applied to this reservation.

Retribution_Enum.description: An enumerated type defining the type of action taken when the deadline has been exceeded.

statusType.description: Indicates the status of the commission payment itself (e.g. no-show indicates that a different commission may be applied if the reservation is not fulfilled).

maxCommissionUnitApplies.description: Maximum number of units for which the commission will be applied. This may be used in conjunction with the frequency attribute.

taxInclusiveInd.description: When true, indicates that the commission is calculated using the rate including tax. When false, indicates that the commission is calculated using the net rate.

AmountDetermination_Enum.description: Used to indicate if an amount is inclusive or exclusive of other charges, such as taxes, or is cumulative (amounts have been added to each other).

participationInd.description: When true, the supplier is participating in a rebate program, e.g. a VAT (value added tax) program.

mandatoryInd.description: When true, a gratuity is mandatory.

Deadline.description: Allows a choice between a time period range, an absolute date or a date range for the appication of a cancellation penalty.

deadlineType.description: An enumerated list of deadline types e.g.Before Arrival.

DeadlineTimePeriod.description: Allows a choice between a time period range, an absolute date or a date range for the appication of a cancellation penalty.

DeadlineAbsoluteDate.description: Allows a choice between a time period range, an absolute date or a date range for the appication of a cancellation penalty.

CancelPenalty.description: The CancelPenalty class defines the cancellation policy of the hotel facility.

numberOfNights.description: Used in conjunction with the basis type when Nights is selected.

CancelPenaltyDetail.description: The CancelPenalty class defines the cancellation policy of the hotel facility.

nonRefundableInd.description: Indicates that any prepayment for the reservation is non refundable, therefore a 100% penalty on the prepayment is applied, irrespective of deadline.

noCancelInd.description: Note: This will typically be set to false indicating that a reservation may be cancelled.

ProductRef.description: A reference to the product for which the rate modifier applies.
Refers to the objID on an object defined elsewhere in the current document.

taxExcludedInd.description: When present and true, tax is excluded from the price.

feesIncludedInd.description: When present and true, fees are included.

gratuityIncludedInd.description: When present and true, the gratuity is included in the price of this product.

numberOfNights.description: The number of nights used to calculate the deposit required.

DeleteOrderRQ.description: The order id of the order that was deleted (canceled).

DeleteOrderRS.description: The order id of the order that was deleted (canceled).

DeleteOrderNotif.description: The order id of the order that was deleted (canceled).
